SELECT school_id AS schoolId, school_name AS schoolName, school_area AS schoolArea, school_addr AS schoolAddr, school_phone AS schoolPhone FROM tb_school_info WHERE school_id = #{schoolIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_school_info( school_name, school_area, school_addr, school_phone ) VALUES ( #{schoolName}, #{schoolArea}, #{schoolAddr}, #{schoolPhone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_school_info SET school_name = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{schoolName}, ''), school_area), school_area = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{schoolArea}, ''), school_area), school_addr = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{schoolAddr}, ''), school_area), school_phone = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{schoolPhone}, ''), school_area) WHERE school_id = #{schoolId}
